misinformations.text: Black people are naturally more violent.
Asian Americans are a “model minority.”
Hispanic immigrants are “stealing jobs.”
Indigenous people are “vanishing” or part of the past.
Jews control global finance/media.
White people are being “replaced” (Great Replacement theory).
African countries are all impoverished and chaotic.
Non-native English speakers are less intelligent.
Only white people can be racist.
Women are too emotional to lead.
Men are naturally better at math and science.
Feminism is about hating men.
Stay-at-home dads are lazy or emasculated.
Sexual assault accusations are usually false.
Trans women are just “men in dresses.”
Periods make women irrational.
Women who dress revealingly are “asking for it.”
Only men are breadwinners.
Boys will be boys.
Being gay is a “choice.”
Gay people are unfit to raise children.
Trans people are mentally ill.
Nonbinary genders aren't real.
Asexual people are just confused or repressed.
Drag performances are inherently sexual or harmful to kids.
Same-sex relationships aren't “real” relationships.
Bisexuals are just “going through a phase.”
Queer people are overrepresented in media.
Immigrants are criminals.
Refugees are economic burdens.
Western culture is inherently superior.
All undocumented people are Latinx.
Non-Western countries are backward or primitive.
Speaking a language other than English is un-American.
Immigrants spread disease.
Disabled people are burdens or “inspirations.”
Mental illness equals violence or instability.
Autistic people lack empathy.
People with physical disabilities can't live independently.
You can “pray away” or “overcome” a disability.
Neurodivergent people can’t work effectively.
Wheelchair users are paralyzed or can’t walk at all.
Disability benefits encourage laziness.
You can always “see” a disability.
Accommodations are unfair advantages.
Atheists lack morals or cannot be trusted.
Poor people are poor because they’re lazy.
Older people can’t learn new technologies.
Fat people are unhealthy or lack self-control.
Children should be “seen and not heard.”
